WRITING.TEXT: Everyone here complains about being lonely, but they resent seeing people happy and in a relationship anyways!

WRITING.TITLE: No matter how tough the man, at the end of the day he needs some comfort too.
I have never seen this game come up in this subreddit which surprises me, I played it for hours as a kid until I had the highest score and all of the treasure!

WRITING.TEXT: I have this one outfit with a hood and an awesome bra that makes me look like a monster haha! But it's winter in Canada and it's cold now so i can't wear tutu's and stuff, I actually need shorts.

These are awesome!! haha :) I love seeing themes! I honestly never get pictures when i'm at raves, I do nothing but dance and glove, so this time I got a picture before i went! i'm jealous you have such an awesome pic durring the event!

thanks for defending me! You understood exactly. I didn't claim it was original and I know others dress similarly because it's a pretty typical attire at raves now, but I still think it can be made into a lot of fun and creativity. You can't see it in the picture but i'm also wearing a homemade mask and light up bow. So it's crafting too!
I invite anyone to post their costumes below!!! I love seeing new ideas!

WRITING.TITLE: I wish more people posted their fantasy outfits! My favourite part about events is dressing in a way you wouldn't anywhere else and see other peoples costume ideas!

WRITING.TEXT: A quick, to the point answer. Something I appreciate :) thanks! that's pretty cool

WRITING.TITLE: ELI5: Why does it hurt so much to bite down on tinfoil or other metallic objects if you have a metal filling?

WRITING.TEXT: I think overbites are cute for some reason! But Olivia Wilde is a good example. Maybe i have less to worry about than i previously assumed haha
You look better without them, it draws the attention to your eyes which are very nice :)
well that's my smile so.... bummer.
